name: battle for the squares(demo)
description:
HI, everyone my name is DmaxGamer, and I am 12 years old.

This is my first game  -  well, not the full game, just the demo. 

The full game is coming soon .

I hope you guys like it and enjoy it. 

The mobile version will be going on playstore I don't know when hopefully soon

and  i'll try to release it on apple store to i'm not promising.

Hope you guys enjoy my game byeee  :)
